newsitem.title: ARGENTINA: Argentina's Menem to make Southeast Asian tour.
newsitem.headline: Argentina's Menem to make Southeast Asian tour.

text.p: Argentina's President Carlos Menem will visit Vietnam, Thailand and Singapore in February, the Foreign Ministry said.

Accompanied by Foreign Minister Guido Di Tella and by a delegation of businessmen, Menem will visit Vietnam from February 16-18. He will be in Thailand from February 18-20 before moving on to Singapore.
Menem's agenda has still to be announced. The visit will follow up another Asian trade offensive last year, when he visited Indonesia and Malaysia.
